ComicInfo.Title: Vida Loca, part 3: The Death of Speedy Ortiz; Human Diastrophism, Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
Vida Loca, part 3: The Death of Speedy Ortiz: Licha looks for Esther and Speedy in an effort to stop the Hoppers/Dairytown war. Maggie finally finds Esther who wants to see him one last time. Blanca and her gang friends confront Esther about Speedy but Maggie steps in her place and takes the blows. Licha finds out. 'Litos is shot by a Dairytown gangbanger and winds up losing an eye. Blanca is brought in to the emergency room, unconscious and in a stretcher. In a decision that would come to haunt her, Maggie shuts Speedy down after he states his love and that she's his last hope. He's later found dead by the side of the road.
Human Diastrophism, Part Three: Chelo announces there's a serial killer in town. Tonantzin is jailed temporarily for her skimpy "native style" outfit. Geraldo denies to Pipo that his letters caused Tonantzin's downward spiral. Archie starts working in the same excavation job that Khamo has. Luba yells abusively at Maricela again. Sven's corpse pops out of a box in a trash dump during a mass slaughter of monkeys. Tonantzin kicks out Carmen after a nasty argument with her. Pipo sleeps with Khamo. Luba has an argument with Heraclio at a bar. She leaves and then seduces Humberto. The alcalde and his wife are found murdered.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 20:30:04. [CVDB95754] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 21:58:31. [Issue ID 212409]

Blanca's gang friends,Cop #2 [Jerry]
Final page flashback: "Big Eddie" Ortiz (single-panel silhouette),Gorro,Cop #1,Izzy's cousins,Rojo (behind the scenes),"Leadside",Carlos,Louis,Grandfather Carranza,Big Eddie's Dairytown Wife (single-panel silhouette)
